###############
continuous time
###############

k_0 = 0.02
theta_0 = 0.5
xi_0 = 0.0178
alpha_0 = 1 + 2 * k_0 / xi_0
beta_0 = 2 * k_0 * theta_0 / xi_0
delta_s = 1
n = 1000
N = 600
Ms = 20
delta = delta_s / Ms
c = 1e-3
h = c / N
